dependencyManager.updatesAvailableDescription: There are {{count}} packages with available dependency updates.

message.criticalBackend: A critical error occurred while processing the node data returned by the backend.

colorTheme.label: Color Theme
colorTheme.description: Choose the Theme for chaiNNer's appearance.

language.label: Language
language.description: Choose the language for chaiNNer's interface.

chainAnimation.label: Chain animation
chainAnimation.description: Enable animations that show the processing state of the chain.

minimap.label: Minimap
minimap.description: Enable a minimap of the current chain in the bottom right corner of the node editor.

snapToGridAmount.label: Snap to grid amount
snapToGridAmount.description: The amount to snap the grid to.

viewportExportPadding.label: Viewport PNG export padding
viewportExportPadding.description: The amount of padding for the viewport PNG export.

startupTemplate.label: Startup Template
startupTemplate.description: Set a chain template to use by default when chaiNNer starts up.

useSystemPython.label: Use system Python (requires restart)
useSystemPython.description: Use system Python for chaiNNer's processing instead of the bundled Python (not recommended)

systemPythonLocation.label: System Python location (optional)
systemPythonLocation.description: If wanted, use a specific python binary rather than the default one invoked by 'python3' or 'python'. This is useful if you have multiple python versions installed and want to pick a specific one.

checkForUpdates.label: Check for Update on Start-up
checkForUpdates.description: Toggles checking for updates on start-up.

experimentalFeatures.label: Enable experimental features
experimentalFeatures.description: Enables experimental features that may be unstable.

hardwareAcceleration.label: Enable Hardware Acceleration (requires restart)
hardwareAcceleration.description: Enables hardware acceleration for the application.

allowMultipleInstances.label: Allow multiple concurrent instances
allowMultipleInstances.description: Allows multiple instances of chaiNNer to run at the same time.

setup.checkingPython: Checking system environment for valid Python...
